title: A Naive Image Manipulation DSL
description: In this work I'm gonna design & implement a functional-style DSL based on simple image manipulation like movement, flipping, connected region extraction, color separation, etc. It's called "naive" because it's intuitive and straightforward. If you like this kernel please upvote. It encorages me to produce more quality content!
